confirm.description:
###### ![AIS logo](/static/icons/ais_google_calendar.png)

This integration allows you to sync events between Home Assistant and your Google calendars.

 Do you want to set up AIS Google Calendars integration?
confirm.title: AIS Google Calendars

oauth.description:
To allow the Home Assistant to access your calendars: 
 1. Copy the code: **{user_code}** 
 2.Paste the copied code on the page that will open after clicking on [this link]({verification_url}) 
 3. When the device is authorized, go back to this page and press the button below **SUBMIT** 

###### ![AIS logo](/static/icons/ais_google_calendar.png)

{error_info}
oauth.title: Device authentication with Google

abort.single_instance_allowed:
You already have AIS Google Calendars set up.

 If you want to reconfigure, remove the current integration first.
